This is the repo for a shiny version of the [fetchR](https://github.com/blasee/fetchR) package.

See the web application [here](https://blasee.shinyapps.io/fetchR_shiny/).

You can run this application locally by installing the **shiny** package in R,
and use the `runGitHub()` function:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
if (!require('shiny')) install.packages("shiny")
shiny::runGitHub("blasee/fetchR_shiny")
```

Or you can clone or download this repository, and use the `runApp()` function:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
shiny::runApp("fetchR_shiny")
```
